title: riot fixed my honor? (automatic?)
body:
so yesterday i made a post here about my honor not being reset from locked to unlocked.

i woke up today, logged on and was greeted with a notification "honor unlocked"

idk if a riot employee did this or if it was just the system working normally but either way i have to retract yesterdays post or at the very least thanks whoever did it.

really means a lot. thank you.

replies.body:
That was an automatic unlocking of your Honor state, which means you've been a more consistently sportsmanlike player recently. Great job, keep it up!

Honor level reset only occured for those who were level 2 or above, players at all other levels remained at that level. See the Honor level reset section on [this site](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor) for details.

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JEdE7p22,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-09T00:43:33.616+0000)
>
> That was an automatic unlocking of your Honor state, which means you've been a more consistently sportsmanlike player recently. Great job, keep it up!
> 
> Honor level reset only occured for those who were level 2 or above, players at all other levels remained at that level. See the Honor level reset section on [this site](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor) for details.

Is there any reason why people that weren't level 2 or above didn't get reset? It makes no sense to me that only a percentage were reset. Literally takes a year to go from 1 to 2. Most people I know who dropped are still at the same level they dropped to, despite getting 2+ honours each game.

Because people were only reset down. If someone finished their ban 2 days before season reset, is it fair for them to get theirs reset when someone else had to wait a couple months? Is it fair to those people who were honour 5 and are now honour 2, to be in the same place as someone who got honour 0 for being a racist ass two weeks ago?

Besides it completely defeats the purpose of honour if you do that. The point of honour is to encourage consistency in positive (or at least neutral) behaviour, not just wait until season reset.
